United States social distancing policies for COVID-19

Source: R/us_state_distancing_policy.R
us_state_distancing_policy.Rd

An updated, curated set of social distancing and non-pharmaceutical interventions for a subset of the states in the United States.

us_state_distancing_policy()

Source

  • https://github.com/COVID19StatePolicy/SocialDistancing/

Kudos

  • Joe Wasserman: http://www.joewasserman.com/

See also

Other data-import: apple_mobility_data(), beoutbreakprepared_data(), cdc_aggregated_projections(), covidtracker_data(), descartes_mobility_data(), ecdc_data(), eu_data_cache_data(), google_mobility_data(), government_policy_timeline(), healthdata_projections_data(), jhu_data(), jhu_us_data(), kff_icu_beds(), nytimes_county_data(), us_county_geo_details(), us_healthcare_capacity(), usa_facts_data()

Other non-pharmaceutical-interventions: government_policy_timeline()

Examples

res = us_state_distancing_policy()
colnames(res)
#>  [1] "location_id"       "StateFIPS"         "StatePostal"      
#>  [4] "StateName"         "StatePolicy"       "Mandate"          
#>  [7] "DateIssued"        "DateEnacted"       "DateExpiry"       
#> [10] "DateEased"         "DateEnded"         "PolicyCodingNotes"
#> [13] "PolicySource"      "StateWide"         "LastUpdated"      
#> [16] "LastUpdatedNotes" 
library(dplyr)
dplyr::glimpse(res)
